sentences.en: At Roma he had no compunction over fielding a three - man attack because he had excellent forwards.
sentences.cn: 在执教罗马队的时候他使用三前锋的阵型,因为他手下有出色的锋线球员.

sentences.en: Employees feel no compunction about undergoing expensive treatments, since the company pays.
sentences.cn: 雇员接受起治疗不管开销多大,毫不吝惜, 因为付账不用找我,公司全包嘛!

sentences.en: He felt a kind of compunction.
He had no compunction about interfering in her private affairs.
sentences.cn: 他对于打扰他的私生活毫不愧疚.

sentences.en: He has no compunction about relating how he killed his father.
sentences.cn: 他毫无悔意地讲述了他如何杀死自己的父亲。

sentences.en: I feel no compunction in doing it.
sentences.cn: 做这件事我不感到负疚.

sentences.en: I felt some compunction at having kept her waiting.
I would have broken my word without compunction.
If I could find the people responsible , I would have no compunction about telling the police.
sentences.cn: 我要知道是谁干的就去报警而毫不后悔.

sentences.en: Margaret has never had any compunction about wearing other people's belongings, or indeed lending her own.
sentences.cn: 玛格丽特从不在乎穿、戴他人的衣服或首饰,也不在乎把自己的衣服借给别人.

sentences.en: On the night of their return , he went to bed full of compunction.
sentences.cn: 抵家的那天晚上, 他睡觉时充满了内疚.

sentences.en: Shame , compunction, sense of futility flooded his whole being.
sentences.cn: 差耻, 内疾和徒劳的感觉浸满他整个的人.

sentences.en: She kept us waiting without the slightest compunction.
sentences.cn: 她一直让我们等著却毫无歉意.

sentences.en: The Twilight Compunction's engines flared and it turned, maneuvering behind a nearby destroyer for cover.
sentences.cn: 悔恨微光号的引擎喷射转向, 机动到附近的驱逐舰后寻找掩护.

sentences.en: They used their tanks against the leftists without compunction .
sentences.cn: 他们肆无忌惮地使用坦克来对付左派人士。

trans.tran_en: a feeling that you should not do something because it is bad or wrong
